meanings.definition: A frozen dessert consisting of flavored liquid or fruit juice on a stick.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing popsicle on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: Kids love to eat popsicles to cool down in the heat.
meanings.sent3: The popsicle melted quickly in the sun, making a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and colorful as a popsicle on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The popsicle vendor's cart was a rainbow of frozen treats.

meanings.definition: A popsicle stick, used to hold a popsicle while eating.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally dropped the popsicle stick on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The popsicle stick had a satisfying crunch when broken in half.
meanings.sent3: He pretended the popsicle stick was a tiny sword, ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: The popsicle stick served as a makeshift bookmark in her favorite book.
meanings.sent5: The popsicle stick bridge held up surprisingly well under the weight of the toy cars.
